name: Blinky
description: In this simple island defence game you play as a small creature who needs to shoot bacteries that fall on the island from above. Use the left and right arrows to control the movement of your creature, use the up arrow to shoot diagonally. Your goal is to prevent the falling parasites from falling to the ground, otherwise your platform will collapse and your character will have less space and in the end you will lose. Have a nice game.
